title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta until crispy. Whisk eggs with Parmesan. Toss spaghetti with pancetta, then mix with egg mixture off heat. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least an hour. Grill until charred. In a pan, cook onions and tomato puree. Add grilled chicken and heavy cream. Simmer and serve.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A rich and creamy Russian dish with sautéed beef, mushrooms, and sour cream served over noodles or rice.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms. Add beef and cook until browned. Stir in sour cream and mustard. Simmer until thickened. Serve over noodles or rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and olive oil.
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough. Add mozzarella cheese. Bake at 220°C (425°F) for 10-15 minutes. Top with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Traditional Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice, raw or cooked seafood, and vegetables wrapped in seaweed.
instructions: Spread sushi rice on nori sheet. Add seafood and cucumber. Roll tightly and slice into pieces. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

title: Tacos Al Pastor
summary: Mexican street food with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro in a corn tortilla.
instructions: Marinate pork in achiote paste and pineapple juice. Grill until slightly charred. Serve on corn tortillas with chopped onions and cilantro.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, eggs, peanuts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Cook rice noodles. Sauté shrimp/tofu. Push to side, scramble eggs. Add noodles and tamarind paste. Stir-fry, then top with crushed peanuts.

title: French Onion Soup
summary: A savory soup with caramelized onions, beef broth, and melted cheese on toasted bread.
instructions: Caramelize onions in butter. Add beef broth and simmer. Pour soup into bowls, top with baguette slices and cheese, then broil until melted.

title: Falafel Wrap
summary: Crispy chickpea fritters wrapped in pita bread with tahini sauce, veggies, and pickles.
instructions: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, and cumin. Shape into balls and fry until golden. Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce and vegetables.

title: Ratatouille
summary: A French vegetable stew made with zucchini, eggplant, bell peppers, and tomatoes.
instructions: Sauté all vegetables in olive oil. Simmer until soft and flavors meld together. Serve warm.
